actionDecl.name: Ospfv2StopHellos
actionDecl.label: Stop Hellos
actionDecl.tooltip: Stop sending hellos for the selected OSPFv2 routers.
actionDecl.description: Stop sending hellos for the selected OSPFv2 routers.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2ResumeHellos
actionDecl.label: Resume Hellos
actionDecl.tooltip: Resume sending hellos for the selected OSPFv2 routers.
actionDecl.description: Resume sending hellos for the selected OSPFv2 routers.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2RestartRouter
actionDecl.label: Restart Router
actionDecl.tooltip: Perform a graceful restart for the selected OSPFv2 routers.
actionDecl.description: Perform a graceful restart for the selected OSPFv2 routers.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2FloodLsas
actionDecl.label: Flood LSAs (deprecated)
actionDecl.tooltip: Causes the router to send the Grace LSA to it neighbors and perform the Graceful Restart operation (This command is deprecated: Use 'Perform Graceful Restart' command instead)
actionDecl.description: Causes the router to send the Grace LSA to it neighbors and perform the Graceful Restart operation (This command is deprecated: Use 'Perform Graceful Restart' command instead)

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2PerformGracefulRestart
actionDecl.label: Perform Graceful Restart
actionDecl.tooltip: Causes the router to send the Grace LSA to it neighbors and perform the Graceful Restart operation.
actionDecl.description: Causes the router to send the Grace LSA to it neighbors and perform the Graceful Restart operation.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2AgeSummaryLsa
actionDecl.label: Age Summary LSA
actionDecl.tooltip: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 Summary LSAs.
actionDecl.description: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 Summary LSAs.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2AgeAsbrLsa
actionDecl.label: Age ASBR LSA
actionDecl.tooltip: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 ASBR LSAs.
actionDecl.description: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 ASBR LSAs.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2AgeExternalLsa
actionDecl.label: Age External LSA
actionDecl.tooltip: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 External LSAs.
actionDecl.description: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 External LSAs.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2ReadvertiseLsa
actionDecl.label: Readvertise LSA
actionDecl.tooltip: Readvertise LSAs for the selected OSPFv2 routers.
actionDecl.description: Readvertise LSAs for the selected OSPFv2 routers.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2AgeRouterLsa
actionDecl.label: Age Router LSA
actionDecl.tooltip: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 Router LSAs.
actionDecl.description: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 Router LSAs.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2RemoveRouterLsaLink
actionDecl.label: Remove Router LSA Link
actionDecl.tooltip: Remove Link for the selected OSPFv2 Router LSA Links.
actionDecl.description: Remove Link for the selected OSPFv2 Router LSA Links.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2AgeTeLsa
actionDecl.label: Age TE LSA
actionDecl.tooltip: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 TE LSAs.
actionDecl.description: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 TE LSAs.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2AgeNetworkLsa
actionDecl.label: Age Network LSA
actionDecl.tooltip: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 Network LSAs..
actionDecl.description: Age LSA for the selected OSPFv2 Network LSAs..

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2RemoveNetworkLsaLink
actionDecl.label: Remove Network LSA Link
actionDecl.tooltip: Remove Link for the selected OSPFv2 Network LSA Links.
actionDecl.description: Remove Link for the selected OSPFv2 Network LSA Links.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2ShutdownRouter
actionDecl.label: Shutdown Router
actionDecl.tooltip: Shutdown the Router for the selected OSPFv2 routers.
actionDecl.description: Shutdown the Router for the selected OSPFv2 routers.

actionDecl.name: Ospfv2RestoreRouter
actionDecl.label: Restore Router
actionDecl.tooltip: Restore the Router for the selected OSPFv2 routers.
actionDecl.description: Restore the Router for the selected OSPFv2 routers.
